normalized: in a fit of rage, i dash towards faust.

name: ichiro
normalized: daamn youu!
with my body brimming with power, my mind can barelyeven keep up with the speed of my dash.
i close the distance between us in a flash and raise myhand with the intent to drive my fist into faust at fullpower.
but, people do not suddenly just turn into heroes.
even with a blazing fast, powerful punch coming at hisway, faust just laughs.
he doesn't seem disturbed inthe least.

name: faust
normalized: young man, you wasted the chance your lover especiallymade for you.
faust says it like a haughty teacher who discovered amistake in the exam of his most hated student.

name: ichiro
normalized: shut up!
i will defeat you!

name: faust
normalized: kukuku, you understand nothing.
the very moment my fist was right in front of faust'sface――

name: ichiro
normalized: guaah!
like i was tied with invisible chains, my body becomesunable to move.

name: ichiro
normalized: （move!
moove!
my fist is right at his nose.
just a little bit more andi can wipe that smirk off his face!
but my body ignores my will and doesn't even twitch.

name: ichiro
normalized: guh!
uooh!
i put all of my strength into breaking these invisiblechains.

name: faust
normalized: you should learn when to give up.
it is pointless.
laughing with a fist right in front of his face, faust'sgaze turns to the collapsed lily and yuko-sensei.

name: faust
normalized: kuku, this is a fine opportunity.
why won't i put up afunny show for you?

name: ichiro
normalized: guh… ghh… w-what… are… you… going…to… do…

name: faust
normalized: it would be good for you to lament your inability tolive up to your lover's expectations.
and grieve yourpowerlessness, young man.
as soon as he finishes saying so, faust slowly startsto approach lily.

name: ichiro
normalized: h-hold iit!
laughing with a broad grin on his face, faust standsnext to the limp lily.
the lily who tried to save meby sacrificing her own body.

name: faust
normalized: what's wrong?
hmm?
you won't help your lover?
once he is done laughing at me, faust suddenly stomps onlily.
faust places his foot on lily's pretty face and grindshis heel on it.

name: ichiro
normalized: oo!
my body becomes hot from my anger and i howl but――
even then, my body doesn't move at all.

name: faust
normalized: kukuku, just a scream?
you won't help?
hmm?
whack!
using the foot he was using to grind on lily's face,faust kicks lily's stomach.
lily had already lost her consciousness so she doesn'teven groan in pain.
she is as limp as a puppet whosestrings have been cut.
even though it's my fault that lily ended up like that…
i can't do anything for her.
i can only look.
my own helplessness is irritating.
and my anger forfaust turns into hatred, filling my chest.

name: ichiro
normalized: stop iit!
o-oo!

name: faust
normalized: hmph, she's a lost cause anyway.
shall i finish her off!
whack!
whack!
faust kicks lily's abdomen again and again.
the dull sound of bones breaking and lily's internalorgans being smashed pierce my hearing.

name: faust
normalized: looks like this is the end.
kukuku, now, this will setyou free of this world.
faust kicks lily again and her trampled, dirt and bloodstained face turns towards me.

name: ichiro
normalized: （lily!
lilyy!
there was no vitality in that face.
it already lookslike a dead person's face.
even then, the slightest amount of breathing could stillbe heard.

name: faust
normalized: hmph, isn't she tenacious!
whack!
intending to finish lily off, faust kicks her so hardthat her body lifts off the ground, then slams back onthe floor and rolls for a while.

name: faust
normalized: kukuku, it looks like she went on ahead of you.
don'tworry, you'll catch up with her soon enough.
faust walks up to where lily's body rolled and pulls thedagger out of her body.
blood drips down on the ground from the extracted dagger.

name: ichiro
normalized: i won't forgive you!
i'll never… forgive you…!

name: faust
normalized: kukuku, not being forgiven is fine with me.
i won'tever meet you again, i'd think.
he points the bloody dagger at the left side of my chest.
as the tip pierces me, i feel slight pain and bloodstarts to flow out of me.
my blood and lily's blood mix in the downward flow.

name: faust
normalized: goodbye, young man.
make merry with your lover in theafterlife.
with an unpleasant sneer on his face, faust buries thedagger without any hesitation.
stab!
i feel the cold metal as it sinks into my flesh.
the moment the burning pain spreads in my body――
ba-dump!
the moment that the dagger's tip reaches my beatingheart, everything blacks out.
a deep, deep darkness swallows me and my despair.

name: ichiro
normalized: （it can't end like this!
such an outcry is futile, of course.
my consciousness iscompletely extinguished.
